alert.note: Alert for Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Suwannee County through 700 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms with heavy rain and gusty winds just south of Luraville, drifting slowly southward. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Suwannee County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
